user.title: KeePassXC OTP Setup
user.description:
Select a person and place the KeePassXC database file in:

**{storage_path}/**

Then enter the filenames below.

⚠️ **Warning:** Files will be securely deleted after import!

data_description.person_entity_id: Select which person this OTP database belongs to

reconfigure.title: Reconfigure KeePassXC OTP for {person_name}
reconfigure.description:
Update OTP entries for **{person_name}**.

Place the updated database in:

**{storage_path}/**

⚠️ **This will:**
- Remove all existing OTP entities for this person
- Extract new OTP entries
- Create new entities
- Securely delete the uploaded files

error.person_already_configured: This person already has a KeePassXC OTP integration configured
error.no_otp_entries: No OTP entries found in database

abort.reconfigure_successful: Successfully reconfigured! All entities have been updated.
